channel.title: Help On File Transfer Between Windows And Whonix
channel.description:
Hey again, friends! How are you today? I hope fine!
Some time ago, I posted about problems Whonix Workstation; however, it has already been resolved. Now, I'm in trouble about file sharing from Windows to Whonix Workstation. How can I do it?
Thank you in advance!

item.title: Help On File Transfer Between Windows And Whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Mason_Joe:

I must create a shared folder with the files?

Yes, that would be one option. Probably the simplest.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Guest_Additions#Shared_Folder

Read full topic
item.source: Help On File Transfer Between Windows And Whonix

item.title: Help On File Transfer Between Windows And Whonix
item.dc:creator: anon60301604
item.description:
Thanks, mate; but, sorry: I’m a bit “noob” on this. How do I could, for example, transfer files from my PC or external HD to the Whonix-Workstation, exactly? I must create a shared folder with the files? Or an ISO image?

Read full topic
item.source: Help On File Transfer Between Windows And Whonix

item.title: Help On File Transfer Between Windows And Whonix
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
File “sharing” or file “transfer”?

For transfer, use read-only media or usb: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/File_Transfer

For sharing, it will depend on Windows location relative to Whonix-Workstation.

Read full topic
item.source: Help On File Transfer Between Windows And Whonix
